titles.title: Upper White Salmon Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
A bill to designate a portion of the White Salmon River as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici under authority of the order of the Senate of 02/17/05 without amendment. With written report No. 109-8.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 19.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/23/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Upper White Salmon Wild and Scenic Rivers Act - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate specified portions of the White Salmon River, Washington, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
